response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product, which holds significant value for us and I believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or business. After careful consideration, I propose a price of $12,000 for the product. This offers a fair balance between ensuring a profitable transaction for me and providing you with an opportunity to acquire something of great worth at a reasonable cost. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
